name: Judgement of the Blade
effect: [Main] 1 of your Digimon with [Huckmon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its type can attack your opponent's unsuspended Digimon for the turn.
security_effect: [Security] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Sistermon] in its name from your hand or trash without paying its memory cost. Then, add this card to your hand.
